flawed_nl_solution:
Fiona earns 40 hours/week * $20/hour = $<<40*20=800>>800/week
So she earns $800/week * 4 weeks/month = $3200/month
John earns 30 hours/week * $20/hour = $<<30*20=60>>60/week
So he earns $60/week * 4 weeks/month = $<<60*4=240>>240/month
Jeremy earns 25 hours * $20/hour = $<<25*20=500>>500/week
So he earns $500/week * 4 weeks/month = $2000/month
Overall their boss has to spend $3200/month + $240/month + $2000/month = $<<3200+240+2000=5440>>5440/month
#### 5440

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600, not 60. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
